name: Villa Veranda
description:
This Roman style veranda, with marble floors and frescoed walls, borders the Outer Peristyle Garden at the Getty Villa, providing you with shade and the occasional bench, as it beckons you through one of the beautiful outdoor spaces at this famous museum.

The Getty Villa, in Malibu, CA, is home to sculptures, manuscripts, and other antiquities, as well as gorgeously manicured gardens.

#10, and the final piece in the "Inviting You Through" series, a collection of windows, archways, and covered passages, which will invite you to look or travel through them, to see what's on the other side, or simply enjoy the journey of getting there.
